metadata.title: CVE-2014-5261 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The graph settings script (graph_settings.php) in Cacti 0.8.8b and earlierallows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shellmetacharacters in a font size, related to the rrdtool commandline inlib/rrd.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5261` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8b+dfsg-5ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.8b+dfsg-5ubuntu0.1').
